participant_1.background:
I think it's really cool to be able to build things with your own hands.
my husband died a few years ago , so i am raising them alone.
my favorite pass time is gazing at clouds.
i live in a house in the country.
my desire is to becom a fashion designer.

participant_2.background:
I live in a small town in the Midwest where I can bowl in peace and quiet.
i like to eat.
I had to rebuild my comic book collection after it was stolen.
i own a pug , and he s the most loyal pet you ll ever have.
My family is supportive of my art career and helps me out when I need it.

content.text: Hello! I hope you are doing well today?
Hey! I am doing great, thanks! How about yourself?
I am doing well too, thank you! I am just hanging out in the country right now with my pug.
That sounds like fun! I am actually from a small town in the Midwest. I like to bowl there because it is so peaceful and quiet.
That is awesome! I have always wanted to bowl, but I have never had the opportunity.
You should try it sometime! It is really fun and a great way to relax.
I will definitely have to give it a try sometime. Thanks for the recommendation!
No problem! What are you up to today?
I am actually working on my art career. I am a fashion designer and I am working on a new collection.
That is awesome! I love art. I am actually an artist myself. I do mostly painting and drawing.
That is so cool! I love seeing other people's art. I wish I was more artistic.
You are artistic! You are designing fashion! That is really creative.
Thanks! I appreciate that. I have always been creative, but I have never really pursued art until recently.
It is never too late to start! I am sure you will be great at it.
I hope so! I am excited to see where it takes me.
I am sure it will take you far! You are very talented.
